author: By Jessie Yeung, Adam Renton, Tara John, Sana Noor Haq, Adrienne Vogt and Joe Ruiz, CNN
title: Russia-Ukraine news and live updates
description: Russian forces are expanding their offensive in Ukraine to the west for the first time. Major cities, including Dnipro and Lutsk, were struck Friday, Ukrainian officials said, as fighting intensified closer to Kyiv. Follow here for live news updates.
content: Russian forces are moving closer to Ukraine's capital, Kyiv, and stepping up their assault on other key cities on day 17 of their unprovoked invasion of the country. Here are the latest developments:â€¦ [+2622 chars]
